walker.easydb.dao
Class EntityParser

java.lang.Object
  walker.easydb.dao.EntityParser

public class EntityParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class parses the BaseEntity object to following parts: the class name of the given BaseEntity object, the fileds and methods of the BaseEntity object.

Author:
HuQingmiao
